name: User receives attestation presentation request via deep link
scenarioId: ios/rQES_R5_Wallet-driven_model_with_internal_Signature_Creation_Application_29/Select_and_authenticate_to_QTSP_R5_119/SelectAndAuthenticateToQTSP:User receives attestation presentation request via deep link
methodName: User receives attestation presentation request via deep link

testSteps.description: Given the QTSP login page is displayed to the user
When the QTSP provides a deep link for attestation presentation of the PID
Then the deep link redirects the user to the EUDI Wallet

userStory.storyName: Authenticate and authorize EUDI Wallet User with QTSP for signing service
userStory.displayName: Authenticate and authorize EUDI Wallet User with QTSP for signing service
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to use my EUDI Wallet to authenticate to QTSPs
  So that I can be securely authenticated and authorized by the QTSP which provides the signing service

title: User receives attestation presentation request via deep link
